attributes.action: Use the army to quell rioters and looters
attributes.additional_details:
The majority of hardworking people of this country, who are seeing their homes and livelihoods destroyed by the rioters and looters in this country ask for support.

We would ask that greater force be used to quell the rioters and looters so they can be arrested and brought to justice.

Consideration should be made for the Army to be involved to protect our nation from the thugs within it.
